content.detailedDescription: I was driving southeast on pch 1 near del prado in dana point, ca at about 4pm. i looked up and straight ahead off in the distance, maybe about a mile or so away from me, i saw this small, bright white object moving incredibly fast from east to west and traveling low near the horizon. it was not shaped like a plane and had no visible wings, tail, or body shape which would have been consistent with a plane or helicopter. at first from the look and size of it, i thought it might be a white sea bird of some type, however the object's motion was far too constant and steady to be a bird, and it's speed was much more rapid than any bird could maintain while flying horizontally. as i was driving and in traffic, i lost sight of the object when it appeared to fly over/behind some trees on the horizon toward my left (west), headed in the direction of the open ocean. it's shape was hard to determine, but my best guess is that it was oval or round or rectangular. the most striking features were the objects incredibly fast speed and bright/shiny white appearance.
content.summary: Fast-moving bright white object heading toward ocean

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to go to the bathroom.  i heard mysterious noises.  then i looked out the window of my house and saw an egg shaped thing  with weird looking symbols hovering my neighbors house.  i was scared to death and i didn't know what to do so i sat there and watched the whole thing. my neighbors ran back inside there house and the weird looking object kept flying over different houses in the neighborhood. then suddenly they dissapeared.  this is the end of my story
content.summary: Big, green, red lights, green things looking out the window

content.detailedDescription:
While driving north through abington pa on easton rd, i was marveling at the clear blue sky when i saw a small white cigar shaped object high in the sky, proceeding west. at first i thought it was a jet, but it was flying much faster than i had seen jets fly. i stopped at a traffic light at edge hill rd, and watched the object continue west. i then saw the object brighten, fade, brighten again, fade again, then disappear. there were no clouds nearby for it to fly into, the sky was clear and almost cloud free, as it was the morning after a storm.
the brightening and fading were what i would expect to see as an object turned or rotated, reflecting the sun. my reaction could best be described as intrigued, in a "huh. look at that." sort of way.
content.summary: I swa a quick white cigar shaped object flying high, then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
some years ago - around 1984 - i was woken at about 01h00 by my hound who wanted to go outside. it was a magnificent night, no haze, no wind, no noise. i sat on the front porch idling listening to the hound sniffing around in a flower bed some 20 feet away. her sniffs carried quite clearly on the still air.
  i was looking at the stars, entranced by their brightness because of the lack of haze. i was facing south-east when directly above me two objects moved in close formation travelling from north-east to south-west. their formation was exactly the same as the leader and the wingman would be in a tight two-ship fighter aircraft formation. they were shaped like five-sided "triangles" as below.

                       ^
                     /   \
                   /       \
                /             \
              /                 \
            /                     \
           /                       \
          /                         \
         /                           \
        /                             \
       /                               \
      /                                 \
     /                                   \
     -------------------------------------  

  their outline was identified by a pale-blue neon-like light and the rest  looked black. they blocked out the stars as they moved. there was no blocking out of the stars beyond the blue outline which seemed to indicate that the blue was inded the outer shape of the objects. without the blue outline i doubt if i would have seen anything at all.
  i have been an aviation "nut" all my life and am a keen birdwatcher and i am confident that these objects were neither aircraft, as i know them, nor birds. many hours trying to identify birds and high flying aircraft have trained me to observe all aspects of what i am looking at. any ornithologist would know what i mean.
  the air was exceptionally still and these objects made no noise whatsoever nor did they exhibit any movement other than forward as, say, a dassault mirage iii would make in normal straight flight.
  i know what a 747 moves and sounds like at 1,000 feet and at 30,000 feet. i also am totally familiar with a mirage iii at around 1,000 to 2,000 feet.
because i had absolutely no indication of the size of the objects - they looked mirage iii size at 1000 feet moving at say 250-350 knots - yet they could equally have been the size of a city block at 40,000 feet and moving at 10,000 knots (assuming that they did not burn up at that altitude and speed!) -  i do not have a clue. i can clearly remember the number of stars they blocked out as they moved but this still did not assist my judgement of their speed and size. i could not guage any height of the objects from their back elevation as they disappeared to the south-west which may indicate that they were big and flat and high.
  obviously "ufo's" crossed my mind but i was intrigued by the fact that these objects did not look like the "traditional 'flying saucers'" i had, or have, read about.
  i never bothered to tell anyone about them for years knowing that people are usually either completely gullible or totally skeptical about any such occurrence.
  i entually dicussed this with a friend who is a member of the skeptics society (and a great admirer of james randi - i may add). we covered all sorts of possibilities but came to no rational conclusion.
  perhaps i was dreaming, perhaps it was an illusion but what i can reiterate is that these objects were not birds and they were not aircraft known to me (and no - they were not the planform of the now familiar stealth fighter or bomber). during the time they passed overhead i continued to hear the hound sniffing - indicating to me that the objects were not emitting any sound that reached my ears. (i have recently tested my hearing and it is perfect.)
i am sensitive to feelings, particularly "hostile" or "negative" ones but felt entirely peaceful during the experience, no excitement, no apprehension, just a feeling of "calm awe".
  i leave you to make up your own mind what could have taken place that night - i simply do not know.
content.summary: 2 "five-sided" triangles in formation

content.detailedDescription:
Good day, just a quick note to bring to your attention my new book called
���doorway to your galactic heritage���.  price $29.95 + s/h 

this book covers your starting point in time and space. akashic records, the start of your journey which would be considered your home planet. the separation process, inner earth, abductions, contacts. star seeding charts. it goes into great detail about the many planets, star systems what role they play in your evolutionary process. who lives there and their trials and progress in time and space. it gives you a wider outlook of where you came from and your many journeys through the many universes. if you ever wonder how you came to planet earth and where you were before, this book will help you discover the truth about the your role and your galactic heritage. this newly revised book has a lot of rare photos taken by me. on the cover of the book is a photo of the space ship 7th dimensional of scientist from polaris, the alien being on the cover of the book is from haldar the cat planet.  also the truth about planet x. or the 10 planet.
when the movie roots came out everyone started to wonder about their own heritage. this was the beginning of parents looking for their children and children looking for their birth parents. others looking for their lost loves, brothers, sisters and families from war torn zones of years gone by. sadly to say with the on going wars and natural disasters this searching is on a daily basis with much sorrow despair and feelings of abandonment. a new industry was build up from this great yearning which nothing seems to fill this void, even after finding them. people started doing their own genealogy charts, searching around the world for their roots. their search did not go far enough looking for their real families. 

each planet and star system has it's own goals and learning, they want to experience. polaris wants to explore what addicions does to the physical body, the spirit and the soul. therefore we find many from polaris on earth with addictions. earth is a great place to work on this or that. sadly to say when they die they feel they have failed because humanity looks down on them for drinking, smoking, and taking drugs which may have caused their death. but this is what they came to learn about so they have not failed but have succeeded indeed. some of my guides who are from polaris said that many do not go back to polaris when they die, for this reason. when in truth they are welcomed with much love and respect on their return. they do not need to punish themselves and keep reincarnating life after lifetime. if these words hit a cord with you please take it to heart.  in my book the truth about planet x and the 10th planet. if you have any questions about my work please feel free to contact me. 
my ufo contacts, let me know when they are in the area. i never have to looking for them. i use mostly a kirlian camera, at times just a regular 35mm or a polaroid camera. see more unusual photos on my website.

caroline connor
email cj31@earthlink.Net
web site http://home.Earthlink.Net/~cj31/
content.summary: I have the feeling they are in the area and just aim the camera.

content.detailedDescription: While at ada hayden lake, (northern most region of ames, iowa) on our small fishing boat, my brother and i spotted a red-orange object beneath dark, heavy clouds. it made it's way toward the lake from the south, having either come over the city heading north, or had dropped out of the clouds. it was a bright object and formless looking at the distance from which i spotted it. being familiar with the area (ie, city lights, towers, etc) the light caught my attention immediately. not to mention there was a dense, low cloud cover and it was approximately 11pm, so very dark. as it got nearer, through our mutual shock and original attempts to explain it as something else, we both noticed it was vaguely diamond shaped, & looked to wobble on an axis. straining to hear a noise, we heard nothing coming from the craft, which was moving in a northerly direction at a fast pace. being dark and uncertain on the height of the ceiling of clouds, i could only guess how large or fast it was. i grabbed a flashling and tried to signal it with timed pulses directed toward it. at it's closest point, it was close enough to one of the shores to see a reflection of it in the water. that specific shore was perhaps 350 meters to the west of us. not long after i flashed my light at it, it seemed to speed up and bow to the east further over the lake, hover, then changed course heading west, southwest. as it hovered, a hole in the clouds opened two or three fist widths in diameter and i saw something very large, grey or black in color with multiple lights. through the clouds around the hole, four or five yellow lights filtered in, these seemed to move with this second craft and i think were a part of it. whatever it was, it filled the small hole in the clouds and then some, meaning it would have had to been enormous. this second craft was moving above the cloud cover in a southwesterly direction and was gone from sight through the hole in a matter of seconds and the yellowish hazey lights faded. looking back to the red-orange object, we watched it hover for a moment, then take it's new course as above mentioned, to the west southwest and stayed on that course below the cloud cover before speeding over the horizon. it seemed to be moving much faster than before as it left the area. the whole affair couldn't have lasted more than three minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two craft, one beneath the clouds, a much larget one above.

content.detailedDescription:
8:20pm hst i stepped outside to smoke. i have a habit of looking at the stars and noticed one large 'star' moving quite quickly north to south. the more i looked i noticed several smaller stars also moving from the north but on the opposite side of my house also toward the south. i called my 11 year old out and simply said, "look at that." and pointed up. he said "what the heck is that?!?!?" i replied, "i don't know but go get my camera." unfortunately my cheapo fuji fine pix doesn't have a night vision capture for video but i did get a few snaps of the larger craft without flash, i zoomed in as close as i could with it. i'll post a link as soon as i get them loaded. all in all we counted about 20 moving craft but those were too small to be captured by my camera. thankfully my husband just purchased a dslr a100 (i believe). he returns on friday so i'll quickly work to figure the thing out and hope that these craft reappear so i can get some quality pics. adreneline is pumping, may not be much sleep tonight!
9pm hst my 14 year old came in the house, we told him what had transpired outside and showed him the pictures.  he insisted on going back out at which time we spotted 12 more craft in appx. 20 minutes all moving north to south.  let me add that we live on the windward side of oahu on mcbh (marine corps base hawaii).  it now sounds as if every plane and chopper on the base has taken to the air.
let me add that it's now 9:40pm, the larger of the crafts is still visible and occassionally stops in the sky before resuming it's southward path.  there are still many smaller craft across the sky and our neighbors have now also began to take notice.
content.summary: Larger craft noticed in the sky moving n. to s. many smaller craft moving in the same direction

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and talking with two of my friends on a sidewalk next to a park on the 6900 block of seasons drive just east of laguna park dr. elk grove california.  i looked up towards the sky because i noticed above a few trees, about 65 degrees above the horizon, something very bright, round, yellow/orange, and much larger than the stars (about the size of a pecil eraser held a arms length).  it started to move extremely fast in a straight line almost due east and in about two to three seconds was completely gone from sight, as i ran to the other side of the trees to get a better look toward the horizon it was already gone. it left no trail or tail.  my friends with me did not see it. i was freaked out becuase i could not explain what i saw, especially the speed it moved.  after a minute or so we continued to walk and after a few minutes we encountered on verdure way two adults with three children standing on the sidewalk outside their parked van. i overheard them talking about seeing an object in the sky and pointing and showing the motion, so i spoke to them about what i saw and we all agreed that we had never seen any thing like it and that becuase of its enormous speed it could not be a jet and because there was no trail it could not be a meteor or a firework. my mind is still boggled.
content.summary: A bright  yellowish-orangish round light moving very rapidly away ttoward the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I went out the house to walk to my car and i noticed the bright white sphere in the sky again, except this time it was about one block closer to the house. last time it was down the street. there were five of us present this time. got pics on 2 different cameras. we were outside for about 30 mins. we were taking still pictures and the object was movig (slowly to the naked eye but seems fast in the pics). we enterd the house to (around right now) upload these pics..We went to check on it outside..And it had dissapeared, if it had stayed there for 30 min straight then why would it dissapear withn 10min. this was no star, no airplane....If you look on the pics on the lower right hand corner there is a still star throughout the whole time. is it coincedense, that it was the same time and place (in the sky) from the last pictures.With these they don't have much of a green glow like last time, it's more of a redish glow this time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Same place as last sighting!! got more pics

content.detailedDescription:
Willmar summer 91
woke up on a ship in dark room wit 2 doorways held suspended in air by orange fog tilted     short guy with hooded trench was there for a few minuties at the end but mostly guy in darker but not black hooded trench robe he wouldnt say much i was yelling and screaming scared and really mad       then i remembered the first half and how i got there and the whole thing involved being taken by several being fighting them as we went then they did some tests with metal things like a dentist thing no cords or machines or anything else in the room kinda techno noises in the back round then after a few hours thay brought me back  the short dude had dark buish wrinkled skin very stocky squarish exacltly like u see in other stories was maybe 3 ft if that and the tall one was 4 1/4ft maybe i was about 5ft at the time       the tall one near the end took his hood off and he was a goblin grey skin pointy ears round wrinkly head exactly what one of several versions you would think of those were the one taking and returning me i did see a second one for a few minutes the only things they said were to the effect that they were just going to do whatever they wanted they had a bad dont care attitude like a doctor doing tests working for a bad dictator like u see in the movies theres some more to it but theres a outline for u    id do want to tlak to that craig guy
content.summary: Abduction - late night intrusion - spontaneous partial memories

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i  (ages 55)  driving west on hwy 24 about 15 miles east of hill city briefly saw a large silver cylinder about 1/3 mile ahead west above the highway,  rise and fall and fly north east about about 50 miles per hhour at about 50 feet above ground.  it appeared to be a cylinder about the size of a 747 fuselage, but  wider in girth and it was a hollow-looking cylinder with no wings, no windows, and no visible propulsion engines.   my friend and i described it separately, rather confirming each others interpretation.  it left no trail.  it was travelling probably 50 miles per hour.   this was friday,  june 22 at about 2 pm central time, 2007.  it was a cloudless sky,  however we could see the craft only briefly between hills from the road.   i sighted it first for about 8 seconds, and asked my friend to observe it while i drove, he also saw it for about 10 seconds before it disappeared behind hills.  i would estimate
content.summary: Silver cylinder,  rose, fell and flew  northeast of hwy 24 15 miles east hill city

content.detailedDescription: on june 21, 2007 my sister and i were standing by the pool talking. i looked up and saw a orange light and thought at first it was a star but i then noticed it was moving in our direction.  i then pointed it out to my sister and we watched it for 4 or 5 minutes.  the orange light was not blinking and was at first moving like a jet and then it took a 90 degree turn to the left going out of sight behind the tree in my front yard.  my sister and i moved over to see on the other side of the tree and there it was again.  it then moved toward us again and then took a 90 degree turn to the right, then in a split second it went straight up and was gone.  i am a true believer in ufo's and at night i am always watching the skies. i am 49 years of age and this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this. it was awsome.
content.summary: Orang light in sky doing strange movements.

content.detailedDescription: Early sunday morning, i was outside my house having a cigarette and just looking at the stars. i was looking at the little dipper when i saw a light appear, it started as a dim star where i could not see one before, and grew larger and brighter, it got to be about the same size as saturn appears here at night, but not as bright, and quite round. it then just disappeared. it never moved and lasted only about a second. i continued to watch the spot and the surrounding area to see if it was a plane, but i didn't see anything else. i never thought it was a ufo, it appeared to me to be more like a meteor that was coming straight at me because there was no movement, or an explosion like a super nova because it appeared to be at a great distance. i thought i would write to you because i don't know where to research such things and if it was an event like a super nova, i sure would like to know. any help you can give me to explain this would be greatly appreciated, thank you for your time.
content.summary: Saw a flash of light near the little dipper

content.detailedDescription: Here are a few pics from monday. a lot of strange things in the sky.
content.summary: Multi sighting over day - phoenix

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from university on a sunny weekday afternoon, turning off the boulevard onto my street when a glint of light caught my eye.  looking into the sky i saw an object and was immediately stricken with the fact that i could not identify what it was.  judging by its distance from me, it would likely have been 5-10 metres tall.  it was cylindrical and tapered in shape, with a flat top and bottom, although the diameter was smaller at the top.  it had a brilliant mirror shine to it which is what made it so striking.  there are no aircraft in my area made with that kind of material, and few that fly in from or around that area (the far south west of the city.)  it hovered directly south of me as i entered the intersection, and i jumped out of my vehicle once i was around the corner to continue watching it.  a lady joined me.  after hovering still for a moment, it began to glide silently to the west, at a relatively fast pace. shortly after, it began a very gradual descent.  we both lost sight of it behind some trees and were not able to spot it again.  niether one of us could think of a rational explanation for what we had seen.  it could not have been a balloon based on the initial, perfectly stationary movement of the object, and it had a very distinct shape that i would attribute to a jujube candy or something of that nature.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Mirror-metallic object hovered over outlying forest

content.detailedDescription: 3 red lights appeared to be hovering or travelling at an indiscernable rate.  all three lights remained in a constant triangular formation relative to one another for the duration of the sighting.  within about a 5 minute time of observing them, they gradually were obscured from our sight, by barely thick enough clouds, so that when they were no longer visible, no more sightings were seen after (damn the luck of the clouds that night).  i am careful about characterizing any sightings in the sky as ufos as i am a frequent sky watcher, day or night.  i am positive that what i saw, and 4 other people also saw, whom i had called their attentions to observe, were 3 red lights that certainly were not airplanes or jets, helicopters or weather balloons.
content.summary: 3 non-blinking red lights were visible in the s. western sky, relative to mt tabor area.

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to get more photos from different vantage points other than where i had been getting photo's for two weeks.  i got in the van and travelled to the next town.  all along the way i randomly snapped pictures.  upon arriving home i uploaded them to my computer and found almost one or more in every picture.  i am not crazy and i can distinguish between a bird, a bug, and an airplane.  in our area (really rural) we don't have many planes except for two military fighter planes that do maneuvers over our valley at varying intervals and occasionally a medivac hospital helicopter.  i have caught everything from orbs, disks, rocket shaped, cloaked disks, and tube shaped ufo's over a 3 week period of time.  it is strange though that after i posted on here last week and uploaded some videos and slide shows to you tube a white car (which i've never seen before ) with gov. tags that read dd or dod-??? has driven by my house a few times.  i am a father of five children and my wife and i work from home.  i am pretty open minded but also analytical and logical about things. if it weren't for so many frequent incidents that seem too coinccidental i wouldn't be posting here. my wife thought i was going crazy at first until i showed her all of the sightings on file and she saw what i saw in them.
content.summary: Snapping photos of sky from van while driving

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8.15 pm june 23 and i was sitting watching tv in my living room when my son came running to the front door saying dad hurry you have got to see this. i jumped up ran outside and he pointed to a star like figure in the sky. to my astonishment it was moving at what i would seem to think was a very high rate of speed being that it appeared to be at a high altitude, it also was making several directional changes which led me to belive it was of intelligent orgin.It also seemed to me to be pulsating or flickering like a sparkler slightly . this object appeared to be about the size of an eraser head on a pencil at arms length, it looked very similar to the star or planet in the sky at the same time that evening that was located in th south east sky from where i was standing,the time it took for this object to cross the sky to the eastern horizion from directly above when i first saw it was probably  less than one minute and thirty seconds.The most interesting thing about this sighting was not the actual object to me but was that as we stood in my front yard and watched this object fly over head and pointed and commented about it several people walked by or jogged and never onnce looked up see what we were talking about ,see i just figure that it is some kind of new goverment technology but later thinking about it ,it just seemed strange how many times do things like this take place just above our heads an we dont even take the time to look up and notice it. also later thinking about it it went down right around seqouia national park where i had heard there had been recent sightings.  my son saw the following prior to me going outside:

i was lying on the grass in my front yard looking up at the moon when i heard a fire alarm blare a few blocks over.  i glanced across the schoolyard that is adjacent to our house and then looked back up.  the sun was just beginning to set and their were few stars out save the bright ones in the west.  that was when i noticed that one of them was traveling at an unusual rate of speed.  it was too fast to be a plane and there were no colored or flashing lights.  it was out of place because it was so bright.  there was no com trail or distinguishing features that would have led me to believe it was anything ordinary.  as it got directly overhead, i noticed it began to drift rapidly from side to side.  not like a turn but more like a skiier drifting side to side.  i was astonished at how it managed to maintain it's forward speed even while drifting.  i'm not one to believe in aliens or anything of the sort but it was highly unusual.  i then thought to tell somebody and quickly got my father.  everything i saw was listed above in my father's statement.  the most interesting thing for me was that i had not noticed it sooner.  it almost seemed to come from nowhere in the quick glance i had made.  thank you for your time.
content.summary: Star like object moving across sky, from west north west ,to east south east at what appered to be a high altitude,it made several changes of direction before dropping down on the horizon

content.detailedDescription: was on the deck having a smoke looked west toward canyon rim.Over the colorado river.A bright light appeared in the western sky as dusk was settling in. i thought it was the sun glinting off of an airplane, yet as it got closer i knew this was different. i yelled at my girlfriend to get the binoculars she came right out and i got focused in and it was a disc. the disc was pulsing a bright light and its speed remained constant as it flew across the entire sky . it was lower than comercial jets fly but still npretty high up. there was no sound no vapor trail. on june 23 2007 at about 10:30 pm mountain time my step son and his friends were at sand flats recreation area they saw a disc pulsing as i had seen the night before. i felt fine i really enjoyed seeing the disc i know it was a ufo i could sense it in my gut. i have seen one other ufo in my life and believe that we are not alone.
content.summary: From east to west across horizon no sound got out binoculars pulsing disc  seen

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 12:30 am, on a warm, clear june 24 night, i turned off the tv and stepped out onto the deck to gaze at the half moon and stars. the moon was fairly bright & somewhat low over the southwest horizon. it lit up the mountains to the south. the northern and eastern sky was much darker than the sky to the south and west. many stars were easily observable to the east & north.

in the eastern sky, two bright orange-yellow lights appeared about 30 degrees over the horizon. i viewed them with binoculars and managed to get a photo of one of the lights. these lights hovered for approximately 10 minutes before slowly descending below the horizon. they were barrel shaped, bright orange, with a lava like red belt running across their middle. they emitted an orange glow. they appeared to move independent of each other. after they disappeared over the horizon, i could still see their glow, leading me to believe that they weren't that far away, 5 to 10 miles maybe was my guess.

i waited about ten minutes longer hoping to see them again. then, the lights slowly rose above the horizon again and hovered for about another ten minutes before they descended below the horizon again. i stayed up about another half hour but the lights did not reappear.
 
this event took place out in the east central wyoming countryside, 8 miles from town, in an area that is remote and sparsely populated. since this is where i live, i am familiar with the terrain and whether seeing lights in this area would be a common occurrence or not. it is not a common occurrence to see any lights where these ones were observed.

since i viewed similar lights in this location several years ago at about the same time of year, i was not all that surprised to see them again. i've never seen anything like them and can offer no explanation as to what they were. could this be an astral phenomenon?
content.summary: 2 bright orange barrel shaped lights hover just over horizon, descend and disappear then reappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking pictures of stars with my canon powershot s3 is digital camera for fun. i was facing i believe the southern sky from my balcony and took a picture. when i uploaded the pics, this object was on the image.  it is pinkish/red with a lime green edge at the bottom and a red light at the lover right bottom of the object. i did not see the object when i snapped the photo.
content.summary: Half circle domed object

content.detailedDescription: At 2:00 am my boyfriend was dropping off a friend when he saw a large glowing green object in the sky. at first, he thought it was a new billboard advertisment because it was so bright and low in the atmosphere. when he got closer to it, he realized it wasn't a sign because it was flying. he followed it until he was as close as a half mile away from it. other people were driving down the road and my boyfriend reported noticing others pointing and looking out their car windows.He left it to come home to wake me up as a witness and to get a camera. at 2:45 we started driving toward toledo. it was so low in the sky that trees and buildings blocked our view. we finally got out to the country with no obstructions and i got my first look at it. it was by that time at least 15 miles away from us over the skyline of toledo. it was huge and glowing a pale green. it seemed to be spinning (slowly) becuase at times it looked like a disc (sideview)and at times it looked narrow light (front/back view). there is no way this object could be mistaken for a plane, star, satellitte, etc. it was too low in the sky and too massive and glowing green! the only possible explanation we could think of to explain it away was that it was a blimp because of its size and position in the atmosphere. online, we looked up commercial blimps to see if any of them glowed green in the sky. we didn't find anything that looked like what we saw. also, why would a blimp be flying that late at night and why did it appear to spin? my understanding is that blimps don't move like that. this object was so large and noticeable, that others around the monroe and toledo area would have had to seen it. i'm searching for reports in the local news, but haven't found any reports. i began to feel scared as we were watching this thing. it was clearly moving too far away from our ability to catch up with it. my boyfriend tried to take a picture, only to find when we rushed to get the camera, there was no disc inside. (we have an old-school digital camera that holds images on discs). we drove back home quite shaken!
content.summary: Low flying huge glowing green object flew over monroe michigan towards toledo ohio

content.detailedDescription: At 11:00 a.M. on the south side of my office building (smoking a cigarette looking at the sky in all directions i could see because i always get to see something unusual and i watch the skies when i can. i noticed the reflection and the object almost immediately upon looking up.  at first i thought it was a helium baloon but there was no string and it was not floating upwards and fliting about as if it were caught by the wind.  the object moved against the wind) i watched a circular shaped object fly horizontally from the southwest towards the northeast in a tumbling motion.  it tumbled end over end and would stabilize and to tumble again, then stabilize again.  this movement continued until out of my view. i watched it as it flew over our parking garage at the height of the 5th floor. it was circular but domed on the bottom and the top.  on one side it was reflective silver and on the other side it was reflective deep red.  about twice the size of a basketball touching its sides.  it kept moving until i lost sight of it. it flew across the metro rail tracks. as i viewed the object i tried to stay as still as possible and clear my mind and focus.  i was afraid if i had bad thoughts about it it might come nearer to me and that's not what i wanted, i was afraid. i thought oh my god it's really there.  i went back into my office building and wrote down what i had just seen.  i shared it with my daughter and my son.
content.summary: Circular metallic object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard and saw a green, shiny trianglar-shaped object flying east slowly.  my sister thinks that it was more square-shaped.  my sister noticed it first, when she was looking up in the sky. then two minutes later she told me about it, and i saw it. at first i though it was a sky diver, but it didn't seem to go down at all. i saw that it was triangular and curved at the edges. it was green except for the center to the back of the object which was black. as it was getting farther away, it became very hard to see. when it was far away, occasional flashes appered under it. it kept on going until we could't see it anymore.
content.summary: It flew over my yard in a easterly direction at a very high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: It was thursday evening, i was driving down a new development area where there is minimal lighting and the sky was very dark and cloudy. there had just been a massive thunder and lightning storm.  my kid & i drive by there all the time, dulles international airport is nearby so seeing flying objects is not uncommon, except we saw a set of 3 lights that were were flying vertical as if the craft was flying in a "standing" position, except once we looked closer, it was 3 globes of white light perfectly parallel over each other, but were individual.  so i thought, :wow" another ufo...(my daughter & i seem to attract them)i've never taken a picture though.  but as we came into the nighborhood, where there are barely any street lights & is very dark,(as u will see in the video) we noticed a very large, glowing ball of light which was obviously not a star!!! at first, i felt weird and sort of uneasy, like we had been "followed" or "watched". my daughter seemed very excited. we were further away from airport flight traffic by now. i pulled the car over, (there were no other vehicles present) and placed the camara on top of the car to take a picture, my camara has a movement focus setting( i take a lot of concert/sport event pics which action snaps still & focused as if the singer or athelete was standing motionless). i didn't realize it til later but i actually got a short video as i was trying to set the camara & you can hear my daughter commenting,"there's the ufo".  the video was shot @ 2154hrs & the first still picture at 2156hrs. i snapped 6 pictures, not moving the cemara from its place, the pics are about 30-45 seconds apart. the last picture was at exactly 2200hrs when the glowing sphere just dissapeared.  i thought the pictures would all come out w/a black sky & a white dot in the center, but when i got home and examined the pictures, they show that it moved positions, changed shape, and the last picture i'd have to say it had to have moved incredibly fast because it looks elongated.  after, we got back in the car, i still felt uneasy, like it was still there but invisible..  it was the first time, i actually got one on camara. first one i've ever reported. let me know what u think. my mufon name is zigmatah
content.summary: Very bright white ball of light, very big, no stars or moon in the sky, visible after thunder/lightning storm

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a spinning object in sky.  the object was teardrop shape.  it seemed to be spinning.  the top of the object seemed to have a red color which would fade in and out as it seemed to spin.  i went to get my camera and when i returned the object was further away but still visible.  i took some pictures and then watched the object slowly move south.  fifteen minutes later two large aircrafts began to circle the area.  the aircrafts cicled at least 25 times.  during this time the object was still visible from my vantage point but small. the object appeared to be in the middle of the circling planes.  strange.....Does anyone know what kind of airplanes these are?  i took a few pics of them.
content.summary: Spinning object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with my brother and father on the balcony outside of my bedroom when i first noticed what looked like a star rising in the north part of the sky. at first i thought it was a star until i realized it was rising up in the sky. i thought it was extrodinary during the duration of the experience. i felt excited and extremely intrested. i stood there and watched it the whole time. not taking my eyes off it. afterwards i felt lucky that i had seen such a thing. i lost sight of the object as it disappeard in the southern part of the sky. the light simply faded and was no longer visable.
content.summary: Object(light) rose from north, traveled north to south, light disappeared in southside of  sky

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30 pm, i went out into my backyard like i always do with my binoculars to look at the cosmos. i had been out there for about 15 min. when all of a sudden, i happened upon these 4 star-like, spherical objects, probably at an altitude of about 100,000 ft., more or less, moving in erratic patterns, and at unbelievable speeds! when i first spotted the objects, they were grouped together, so perfectly that it's almost safe to say that the objects made a complete 360 degree square. all of a sudden, the objects just shot down, then to the left, and then up again. i stopped looking at the objects, thinking that it was just probably nothing, but i became curious, and happened to look up once more. and with luck, there were the objects, making the same maneuvers that they had the first time. i started to think, "wow! i think i'm really seeing an ufo phenomenon!" so i put down my binoculars to put my glasses back on, looked up again, and the objects were gone! after the event, i ran inside and got online to report the ufo's. what really got me to notice the objects in the first place was the unbelievable speeds at which they moved. when i first saw the objects i thought that they were just a simple star cluster, but apparently i was wrong.
content.summary: As i looked up into the southern hemisphere with my binoculars, i noticed 4 star-like, spherical objects moving in erratical patterns at unbelievable speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around the track at the local middle school. i looked over because there was someone firing a hand gun in the woods. i noticed the jet streams in the air.  one jet had already passed. i looked at the jet that was passing. directly underneath the jet (about an inch below looking at it) was a dark circle, aligned with the jet, flying the same speed as the jet & not leaving a jet stream. i stopped walking. i could not believe what i was seeing. i've seen things before but only for split moments. this was continuos and very clear. i stood and watched it for about 20-30 seconds. i then began to jog across the field to call my buddy. as i was jogging across the field the dark circle flew far out in front and above the plane, leaving no jet stream. it then suddenly became a silver cigar shaped object only for a second. it returned to the dark sphere shape and flew back behind and lower than the plane. once again it turned this silver cigar shape for a second and then back to the circle shape. i reached into my car, pulled out my cellphone & called my friend. when i looked up again it was gone. i continued to watch the jet until it was no longer in sight.  2 more jets passed within the next 20 minutes, but with no objects following them.
content.summary: Ufo flying near a jet in kannapolis
